Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran pumped Yuzvendra Chahal for a four and a six off the next three deliveries
Romario Shepherd deposited Axar Patel for a six and four
Tilak Varma pulled back-to-back sixes to show us just a glimpse of the future
Pre-Game Insights: West Indies wouldn't want to tinker with a winning combination, especially since one more victory would take them close to a series win.
India might force India to play Yashasvi Jaiswal, the only spare batter in the squad, leading to a toss up between Kuldeep and Chahal
Miscellaneous Highlights: Two of the last five T20Is at Providence Stadium in Guyana have been washed out.
The scores batting first in the three completed games were 146, 157 and 163, with the chasing team winning twice.
Others: Romario Shepherd has a strike rate of 205.88 in the last five overs in T20Is this year, the second-best for any batter to have faced at least 30 deliveries in that phase.
Hardik Pandya strikes at only 106.31 in the middle overs, hitting just one out of the 95 balls he has faced for six.
